= gff2sft =

== Format ==
cg gff2sft ?infile? ?outfile?

== Summary ==
Converts data in gff format to gene sft (simple feature table) format

== Arguments ==
; **infile**: file to be converted, if not given, uses stdin. File may be compressed.
; **outfile**: write results to outfile, if not given, uses stdout

== Category ==
Conversion
